oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PFC Christopher Ammons searching canal for Viet Cong weapons

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: PFC Christopher Ammons searching canal for Viet Cong weapons in the Iron Triangle. He is carrying an M79 grenade launcher.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Firearms; Men; Soldiers
Ammons, Christopher D., 1948- ; Vietnam War, 1961-1975; United States -- Army -- Firearms; M79 grenade launcher
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ammons, Christopher D., 1948-
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Iron Triangle is the name U.S. forces in the Vietnam War gave to the Communist stronghold region northwest of Saigon. The M79 grenade launcher is a single-shot, shoulder-fired weapon.
